text: Ponta Porã Sociedade Esportiva, commonly known as Ponta Porã, is a Brazilian football team based in Ponta Porã, Mato Grosso do Sul state. ==History== The club was founded on March 2, 1998. Ponta Porã won the Campeonato Sul-Mato- Grossense Second Level in 2010. ==Achievements== * Campeonato Sul-Mato- Grossense Second Level: ** Winners (1): 2010 ==Stadium== Ponta Porã Sociedade Esportiva play their home games at Estádio Municipal Aral Moreira. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 6,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1998 Category:Football clubs in Mato Grosso do Sul Category:1998 establishments in Brazil Category:Ponta Porã
title: Ponta Porã Sociedade Esportiva
